Reviews.Title: Aposonic quality with a new, easier to use interface
Reviews.Author: Andrew Winningham
Reviews.Content: Excellent functionality, but much easier to use than my previous Aposonic DVR.  The interface is much more intuitive, and the DVR automatically records on motion - saving a huge about of configuration work from my past DVR.  Also, that motion detection is much smarter that the motion detection on my previous DVR.  This is a great one to get!

ProductInfo.Features:
D1/Half D1/CIF Real-time Recording and Playback. Recording 720x480 resolution at 30 Frame Per Second on 4 channels or 18 FPS on all 8 channels. Recording 720x240 at 30 FPS on all 8 channels
The desired recording quality can be managed through intuitive screen. The recording time availability will be varied based on the recording resolution settings and the HDD capacity
Powerful Configuration capability of Live-view, Recording, Playback, Motion/Alarm, Backup, Remote access. Friendly and Easy Graphical User Interface
Supports UPnP. Don't worry about the network setting/port forwarding anymore
Live view and access control through Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, and Mac OSX/safari. Streaming live video on mobile smart phone via free app
ProductInfo.Name: Aposonic A-S0804R18E H.264 8-Channel D1 Real-Time Surveillance Standalone DVR Camera with HDMI Output (Black)
